description: This file defines a Python class 'WebTools' that provides web-related utility functions, specifically URL expansion using HTTP HEAD requests with retries.

classes.name: WebTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for web-related utilities, inheriting from Toolkit, providing URL expansion functionality.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the WebTools instance with a specified number of retries and registers the expand_url method.

methods.name: expand_url
methods.description: Expands a shortened URL to its final destination by making HTTP HEAD requests with retries, returning the expanded URL or the original URL if unsuccessful.
